Section.name: About KITS
Section.description:
Kamala Institute of Technology and Science (KITS), Karimnagar was established in 1997. The institute offers undergraduate programs in six disciplines of engineering viz., electrical and electronics, electronics and communications, computer science, information technology, mechanical engineering, civil engineering and two post graduate programs(M.Tech) in advanced manufacturing systems, digital systems & computer electronics.
